info.title: Pack Containers
info.description: Using this service, you can pack and dispatch shipment items, handling units and containers. Service provides the capability to read, update, assign voyage, and dispatch shipment items, handling units and containers. The service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed by external systems.

x-sap-shortText: Manage Containers, Shipment Items, Handling Units and their Voyages using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Field Logistics Planning and Execution(40G)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/40G " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Field Logistics:Pack container extension (FLOG_SHPTCTNUNIT)
* Field Logistics : Shipment Item Extension (FLOG_SHPTITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
